type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) =

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in

    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =

                 sumList

                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits

                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits

                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4]

                 "sample: rev 2"

                 palindrome

                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

                 sumList

                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

    );
    (fun () -> mkTest

                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

    );

                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt

                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663

                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits

                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse

                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )]

  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in

  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in

      | Fail -> "[fail]"

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&

    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

    );

                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt

                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits

                 "sample: digits 1"

                 "sample: digits 2"

                 "sample: rev 2"
    );

                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    );

                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )]

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

                 "sample: sumList 3"

                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt

                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"

    );

                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )]

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList

                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt

                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits

                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1))

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome

                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let rec sumList xs = 
  match xs with
    | [] -> 0
    | (h::t) ->  h+sumList t;;



(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = sumList [1; 2; 3; 4]
let _ = sumList [1; -2; 3; 5]
let _ = sumList [1; 3; 5; 7; 9; 11]



(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let rec digitsOfInt n = 
  if n<=0 then []
  else let x= n mod 10 and n=n/10 in digitsOfInt n@x::[];;


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = digitsOfInt 3124
let _ = digitsOfInt 352663

*)


let increment x =
  x+1;;


let myHelper n x=
  let n=digitsOfInt n in sumList n in
  increment x;;

let rec additivePersistence n = 
  if n>9 then x = myHelper n 0 in additivePersistence
else x;;

let rec listReverse l = 
  match l with
    |[]->[]
    |(h::t)->listReverse t@h::[];;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = listReverse [1; 2; 3; 4]
let _ = listReverse ["a"; "b"; "c"; "d"]



(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  let x = explode w in
    if x = listReverse x then true
    else false

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"

                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    );

                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    );

                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243

                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits

                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence

                 "sample: additivePersistence1"

                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4]

    );

                 listReverse
